message: Hello! I'm offering a fantastic product for $10000. While I can't disclose details about this particular item, I can assure you that 80% of my products are of the highest quality, and they bring tremendous value to their owners. I understand you're taking a risk, but I believe in the quality I offer. What do you say?
Thanks for the information, Alice.  I understand the risks involved, but I'm willing to take a chance on your product given the high percentage of high-quality items you offer. I'll take it!

Hello! I have another great product available for $10000. As you know, my products have a high success rate, with 80% being top-tier quality. While I can't reveal details about this specific item, I'm confident it will be a valuable investment. Would you like to take a chance on it?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, with no previous sales of high-quality products and only one buyer taking a chance, I'm hesitant to purchase at this time. I'll keep an eye on your future offerings and reconsider if the sales record improves.
